title: Blazor WebAssembly ASP.NET Core Hosted - Authentication not working for any razor pages under /Server/Pages
body:
I want to setup a website where all public pages are served by the server project and only registered users will/can launch the Blazor application. I am able to achieve this.

The part where I am failing is when razor pages are placed under /Server/Pages/ the authentication providers don't work. The same page (say MyPage.cshtml) works fine if the route is /Identity/Account/MyPage but fails if placed in /Pages folder of the Server project.

My cookie basepath is set to /

GitHub repo demonstrating my issue:- https://github.com/fornax76/IdentityDemo

How do I ensure that authentication (User.Identity.IsAuthenticated) works for razor page Index.cshtml placed under /Server/Pages ?
